name: Fetch (itch)
description:
A game about playing fetch with my dog Harry, who is a good boy. He'll bring the ball back most of the time but sometimes he's a jerk and he'll just wait for you to come get it.

Left and right to walk. Hold down spacebar to charge a throw, then release and cross your fingers that Harry actually brings the ball back. Escape to quit once you're fed up with him.

I haven't tested the Windows build so let me know if you find anything broken.

Music kindly contributed by Dylan Burns, who jammed it up really quickly for me. Sound effects are my own fault, however.

(In 2017 I am challenging myself to make 50 little videogames to get more familiar with the tools. I make no guarantee then any of the games are good, but that's not really the point. This is game #2 or 50.)
